remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当开发 Windows 应用商店应用时, 这些扩展方法才可用。These extension methods are available only when you develop Windows Store apps. 方法提供了在 Windows 应用商店应用中打开文件以进行读取或写入的便利方法。The methods provide convenient ways of opening files for reading or writing in Windows Store apps. 不创建`WindowsRuntimeStorageExtensions`类的实例, 而是使用和接口的实例中的这些方法。You do not create an instance of the `WindowsRuntimeStorageExtensions` class; instead, you use these methods from instances of the and interfaces. 类包含两个扩展以进行读取或写入的方法: `WindowsRuntimeStorageExtensions`The `WindowsRuntimeStorageExtensions` class contains two methods that extend for reading or writing: - - System.io.windowsruntimestorageextensions 类包含两个扩展以进行读取和写入的方法:The WindowsRuntimeStorageExtensions class contains two methods that extend for reading and writing: - - ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在 Windows 应用商店应用程序中以的形式打开应用程序数据中的文件, 并使用类的实例向其写入数据。The following example shows how to open a file in the application data as a in a Windows Store app, and write to it by using an instance of the class. 然后, 它使用类的实例来读取该文件的内容。It then reads the contents for the file by using an instance of the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Windows 10 周年更新中, 新的接口已添加到中, 允许创建标准 Win32 文件句柄`IStorageFolderHandleAccess` : `IStorageItemHandleAccess`和。With the Windows 10 Anniversary Update, new interfaces were added to and that allow creating a standard Win32 file handle: `IStorageFolderHandleAccess` and `IStorageItemHandleAccess`. 扩展方法`Create`组利用这些接口的方法。 `CreateSafeFileHandle`The `CreateSafeFileHandle` group of extension methods take advantage of the `Create` methods of these interfaces. API 的主要优点是可以访问中转`SafeFileHandle`。The key benefit of the API is access to a brokered `SafeFileHandle`. 如果要在[AppContainer](https://docs.microsoft.com/windows/win32/secauthz/appcontainer-isolation)中运行或时创建, 这一点至关重要。This is critically important if you want to create a around an or when you are running in an [AppContainer](https://docs.microsoft.com/windows/win32/secauthz/appcontainer-isolation). 在 AppContainer 中运行时, 应用程序具有非常有限的文件访问权限。When running in an AppContainer, the application has very limited file access rights. 例如, 图片和文档文件夹需要通过`RuntimeBroker.exe`代理的本机文件句柄, 因为应用程序本身不具有对大多数文件的权限。Things like picture and document folders require the native file handle to be proxied via `RuntimeBroker.exe`, as the application process itself doesn't have rights to most files. 此 API 获取代理的句柄。This API gets the proxied handle. 如果访问用户数据文件夹或使用文件选取器, 则应始终使用此 API 来创建。If accessing user data folders or using a file picker, this API should always be used to create . 在这些情况下, 使用路径通常会引发。Using a path will often throw in these cases.
